subject: TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT
body:
CNN.com - Showbiz Tonight










TONIGHT ON SHOWBIZ TONIGHT- CNN HEADLINE PRIME 11pm ET/ 11pm PT

LARRY BIRKHEAD IS THE DAD -- BUT WHAT'S NEXT?
DNA
tests prove that Larry Birkhead is the father of Anna Nicole
Smith's baby, Dannielynn. But the custody fight may not be
over! Showbiz Tonight goes to the Bahamas to get to the bottom
of the story that everyone's talking about, on TV's most
provocative entertainment news show.

WHAT YOU DIDN'T
KNOW ABOUT "MARCIA BRADY"
"Brady Bunch" star Maureen
McCormick opens up about her battles with cocaine addiction and
bulimia, and how she fought back from both. It's the interview
you will see only on Showbiz Tonight! 

THE DON IMUS
CONTROVERSY EXPLODES!
Is Imus' suspension for making racial
comments about Rutgers' Women's basketball team enough? Should
stars boycott his show? Is Imus really sorry? Showbiz Tonight
asks all the provocative questions!

SHOWBIZ TONIGHT
QUESTION OF THE DAY: 
Howard K. Stern is not the father: Do
you feel sorry for him? 
VOTE AT CNN.COM/SHOWBIZ TONIGHT.

SEND US A VIDEO EMAIL! 
Send your response to the
Question Of The Day on video. Look into your camera and tell us
what you think. Responses must be no longer than 30 seconds. To
send your video email, go to cnn.com/showbiztonight.Watch your
video responses on "Showbiz Tonight" at 11 p.m. ET/PT on CNN
Headline Prime.
